Package utils

Class WeatherAnalytics

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.WeatherAnalytics
  • public class WeatherAnalytics
extends java.lang.Object
    The WeatherAnalytics class contains static methods for analysis on weather readings

        public static double calculateWindChill​(double temperature,

        Returns wind chill value for a given temperature and wind conditions
        Parameters:
        temperature - Temperature in degrees Celsius
        windSpeed - Wind velocity in kilometers per hour
        Returns:
        Wind chill value

      • getTemperatureTrend

        public static int getTemperatureTrend​(java.util.List<Reading> readings)
        Returns an int representing the temperature change trend on last 3 readings.
        Parameters:
        readings - List of Readings
        Returns:
        integer representing the trend: -1 downwards trend, 1 upwards trend, 0 no significant change

      • getPressureTrend

        Returns:
